description:
■Content
Special Blade Rift Blade
Special Katana Masterpiece
Special Spear Sharpened Fang Spear
Special Bow Sky Piercer
Special Horse
Special Skill Gem Set
Items

■How to use
Special Blade, Special Katana, Special Spear, Special Bow, Special Horse: Equipable at My Castle in "Musou Mode" or "Citadel Mode" by selecting "Dojo" - "Change Equipment".

Special Skill Gems: Gems can be used to upgrade weapons at My Castle in "Musou Mode" or "Citadel Mode" by selecting "Blacksmith" - "Craft Weapon".
name: Digital Deluxe Edition Bonus
